author: Daniel Greene
description:
The Dresden Files is finally getting a new adaptation! Use code GREENE and get 15% OFF + a Free Gift for New Customers. https://huel.com/greene #ad Jim Butcher’s iconic urban fantasy series may be heading back to screen, and fans have every reason to be cautiously hyped. In this episode of Fantasy News, I break down what we know so far—and what this could mean for the franchise.

We also cover a leaked LEGO Balrog set, Tolkien’s new statue unveiling, a major fan campaign for Wheel of Time, and Sanderson teasing full-on Dune-style sci-fi in the Cosmere. There’s controversy too—voice actors speak out against AI, Star Wars is catching heat for AI-generated FX, and Netflix quietly kills Rebel Moon.

title: NEW Dresden Files Adaptation?! Tolkien Honored, Wheel of Time Rallies | FN
